`static` (in C#) or `Shared` (in Visual Basic) methods that operate on an object that controls access to the critical section. 为每个同步对象维护的以下信息：The following information is maintained for each synchronized object: - 对当前持有锁的线程的引用。A reference to the thread that currently holds the lock. - 对就绪的队列，其中包含准备好获取锁的线程的引用。A reference to a ready queue, which contains the threads that are ready to obtain the lock. - 对包含的锁定对象的状态的更改通知等待的线程的等待队列的引用。A reference to a waiting queue, which contains the threads that are waiting for notification of a change in the state of the locked object. 锁定对象（即引用类型），而不是值类型。 locks objects (that is, reference types), not value types. 虽然可以将值类型传递到 和 ，但对每个调用它都分别进行了装箱。While you can pass a value type to and , it is boxed separately for each call. 由于每次调用都将创建一个单独的对象，所以绝不会阻止 并且它应该保护的代码不会真正同步。Since each call creates a separate object, never blocks, and the code it is supposedly protecting is not really synchronized. 此外，传递到 的对象不同于传递到 的对象，因此 将引发 异常并显示消息“从代码的非同步块调用了对象同步方法。”In addition, the object passed to is different from the object passed to , so throws exception with the message "Object synchronization method was called from an unsynchronized block of code." 以下示例阐释了此问题。The following example illustrates this problem. 它启动十个任务，其中每个任务仅休眠 250 毫秒。It launches ten tasks, each of which just sleeps for 250 milliseconds. 然后，每个任务会更新计数器变量 `nTasks`，该变量用于计算实际启动和执行的任务数。Each task then updates a counter variable, `nTasks`, which is intended to count the number of tasks that actually launched and executed. 因为 `nTasks` 是一个可同时被多个任务更新的全局变量，所以使用监视器防止其同时被多个任务进行修改。Because `nTasks` is a global variable that can be updated by multiple tasks simultaneously, a monitor is used to protect it from simultaneous modification by multiple tasks. 但是，如示例输出所示，每个任务都将引发 异常。However, as the output from the example shows, each of the tasks throws a exception. 关键节The critical section 使用和方法将标记的开头和结尾的关键部分。Use the and methods to mark the beginning and end of a critical section. > [!NOTE] > 提供的功能和方法等同于由提供[锁](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/lock-statement.md)C# 中的语句和[SyncLock](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/synclock-statement.md)不同之处在于在 Visual Basic 中的语句语言构造大大降低环绕方法重载并中的方法`try`...`finally`The functionality provided by the and methods is identical to that provided by the [lock](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/lock-statement.md) statement in C# and the [SyncLock](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/synclock-statement.md) statement in Visual Basic, except that the language constructs wrap the method overload and the method in a `try`…`finally` 若要确保监视器被释放的块。block to ensure that the monitor is released. 如果关键部分是一组连续的说明，然后获取的锁的方法可保证只有一个线程可以执行与锁定的对象所包含的代码。If the critical section is a set of contiguous instructions, then the lock acquired by the method guarantees that only a single thread can execute the enclosed code with the locked object. 在这种情况下，我们建议你将在该代码放`try`阻止并发出到呼叫中的方法`finally`块。In this case, we recommend that you place that code in a `try` block and place the call to the method in a `finally` block. 这可确保即使发生异常，也将释放该锁定。This ensures that the lock is released even if an exception occurs. 下面的代码段演示了此模式。The following code fragment illustrates this pattern. [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Monitor.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.monitor.class/cs/Pattern2.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Monitor.Class#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.monitor.class/vb/Pattern2.vb#2)] 此工具通常用于同步访问静态方法或类的实例方法。This facility is typically used to synchronize access to a static or instance method of a class. 如果临界区跨越整个方法，可以通过锁定设施放置方法，并指定的构造函数中的值。If a critical section spans an entire method, the locking facility can be achieved by placing the on the method, and specifying the value in the constructor of . 使用此属性时和不需要方法调用。When you use this attribute, the and method calls are not needed. 下面的代码段演示了这种模式：The following code fragment illustrates this pattern: [!code-csharp[System.Threading.Monitor.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.monitor.class/cs/Pattern2.cs#3)] [!code-vb[System.Threading.Monitor.Class#3](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_CLR_System/system.threading.monitor.class/vb/Pattern2.vb#3)] 请注意，该属性会导致当前线程持有锁，直到该方法返回;如果可以更快地释放锁，则使用类，C#[锁](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/lock-statement.md)语句或 Visual Basic [SyncLock](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/synclock-statement.md)语句而不是属性的方法。Note that the attribute causes the current thread to hold the lock until the method returns; if the lock can be released sooner, use the class, the C# [lock](~/docs/csharp/language-reference/keywords/lock-statement.md) statement, or the Visual Basic [SyncLock](~/docs/visual-basic/language-reference/statements/synclock-statement.md) statement inside of the method instead of the attribute. 尽管很可能和锁定和释放给定的对象跨成员或类边界的语句，不推荐这样做。While it is possible for the and statements that lock and release a given object to cross member or class boundaries or both, this practice is not recommended. ## Pulse 和 PulseAll 等待Pulse, PulseAll, and Wait 后一个线程拥有该锁，并已进入关键节锁保护，它可以调用， ，和方法。Once a thread owns the lock and has entered the critical section that the lock protects, it can call the , , and methods. 当线程，持有的锁调用、 释放锁和线程添加到已同步的对象的等待队列。When the thread that holds the lock calls , the lock is released and the thread is added to the waiting queue of the synchronized object. 准备就绪的队列中的第一个线程如果有，获取该锁，进入关键节。The first thread in the ready queue, if any, acquires the lock and enters the critical section. 该线程从等待队列移到准备就绪的队列时任一（若要移动，线程必须等待队列的开头） 或持有锁的线程调用方法。The thread is moved from the waiting queue to the ready queue when either the (to be moved, the thread must be at the head of the waiting queue) or the method is called by the thread that holds the lock. 方法返回时调用的线程重新获取该锁。The method returns when the calling thread reacquires the lock. 当线程，持有的锁调用，位于等待队列的开头处的线程移动到准备就绪的队列。When the thread that holds the lock calls , the thread at the head of the waiting queue is moved to the ready queue. 对调用方法将所有线程从等待队列都移到准备就绪的队列。The call to the method moves all the threads from the waiting queue to the ready queue. ## Examples 下面的示例使用类所表示的随机数生成器的单个实例对访问进行同步类。The following example uses the class to synchronize access to a single instance of a random number generator represented by the class. 该示例创建了十个任务，其中每个线程池线程异步执行。The example creates ten tasks, each of which executes asynchronously on a thread pool thread. 每个任务生成 10,000 的随机数字、 计算其平均值，并更新维护的随机数字生成数的运行总计和其总和的两个过程级变量。Each task generates 10,000 random numbers, calculates their average, and updates two procedure-level variables that maintain a running total of the number of random numbers generated and their sum. 所有任务都执行完成后，然后使用这两个值来计算总体的平均值。After all tasks have executed, these two values are then used to calculate the overall mean.
